person.persName: C. C. Richardson (Graves County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Graves County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Martha Richardson. Father of William Richardson, Carter Richardson, James Richardson, Charlotte Richardson, Elizabeth Richardson, Nancy Richardson, Cynthia Richardson, Henry C. Richardson, Malinda Richardson, and Sarah Jane Richardson. Farmer in Graves County in 1850 and 1860.
